Me and a mocchi
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Short Fiction: Me and a mocchi
By PikaEd on Sunday, September 2, 2001 - 11:59 am:

My story is 1 of a mocchi and a trainer(namely me).ok its short.


Just coming from Fimba I came to sign up for a new challenge a fight.Ima was next I thought to myself.Questions were asked and an assistant assigned,colt was her name,anyone would be fine.
I went to the market and scaned a disk a mocchi I found was not on the fimba continent, not knowing what it was I named it Mocchi.
Training was easy it was bad at nothing.I fought threw E class easy enough a thrust and a slap was end of E.In D class roll assault was realized and was the end of many.In C class was the longest i learned many moves, roll attack,petal swirl and many others.B class was my next stop Galis and a Jill where hardest there.A class Gotrect dominated.A quick tail assault or a roll and that was the end of mocchi until 1 month on a island errantry the move was learned.Mocchi Ray finished A class for me.5 years 6 months S class was a foot.That Joker cant take me seriously
though.until I gouged my name in his mask with his scythe.Finishing S class my first monster did but upon this my mocchi's life completed. My first Ima monster was cool but now he gives me strength from where he lies to me and my nagas.A sad tale this was I liked to tell it. So the moral is never underesstimate a mocchi and his friend.


How you'd ya like it send comments.

By PikaEd on Sunday, September 2, 2001 - 03:44 pm:

By Master Breeder Wannabe on Sunday, September 15, 2002 - 10:30 pm:

Once upon a time I met this chick named Holly. "Hi," I said. "I'm Bill... what's your name?"
"Holly," she said.
"That's a dumb name."
"I know." then she sat down and cried.
"I'm sorry... I didn't mean it," I told her. "Hey! what's your favorite food?"
"roast duck."
"Ok, lets go find a duck."
So we look all over and we couldn't find a duck. we searched and searched for almost a year when we finally found a Mocchi.
"Hey! that thing has a duck bill!" I said.
"Cool," she said "let's eat it."
"But what if it's somebody's monster?"
"Who cares?!?! We haven't eaten nearly a year searching for a stupid duck... this thing is close enough."
So we ate it and we were so hungery we didn't even cook it. We only ate half of it though, because it tasted funny... but that's alright, because we were full. Then this wierd old guy came walking up to us.
"Hey, have you seen a mocchi anywhere? I lost him a couple hours ago and I can't find him anywhere! Oh, I love him so much... I hope he turns up."
"Sure, you can have the rest, I'm stuffed," said Holly.
And then the old man looked at the mocchi and cried.
"I'm sorry for your loss," said Holly. "We tried to help him. But we were too late."
"And he tasted good," I said. A year later Holly and I got married, but then we got devorced because she ate my jell. She ate it because we ran out of jello.
THE END
